titles.title: Celebrate the United States Constitution Day Act
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make the date of the signing of the United States Constitution a legal public holiday, and for other purposes.
Celebrate the United States Constitution Day Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Celebrate the United States Constitution Day Act - Establishes as an annual legal public holiday Constitution Day, September 17, the date of the signing of the United States Constitution.
